mapper.sql: id, title, cover, type, target_id, quantity, admin_id, target_date, created, updated, start_time, end_time, count
mapper.select: select * from welfare where now()>= start_time and now() < end_time

select a.* from ( select a.*, b.price from welfare a left join item_sku b on a.target_id = b.id where a.type = 1 union select a.*, b.price from welfare a left join virtual_item b on a.target_id = b.id where a.type = 2 ) a where now()>= start_time and now() < end_time
mapper.insert: insert into welfare (id, title, cover, type, target_id, quantity, admin_id, target_date, created, updated, start_time, end_time, count) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into welfare
id,
title,
cover,
type,
target_id,
quantity,
admin_id,
target_date,
created,
updated,
start_time,
end_time,
count,

mapper.update:
update welfare
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
target_date = #{targetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update welfare set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target_date = #{targetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
